content.raw: Yes that would work. I was going to try with `setScale({this->scale.X(), this->scale.Y(), 1});`
content.html: Yes that would work. I was going to try with setScale({this->scale.X(), this->scale.Y(), 1});

content.raw: perhaps `using Vector = Eigen::Vector3<something>;` would be helpful?
No problem. I'll create a follow up PR.
content.html: No problem. I'll create a follow up PR.

content.raw: sorry I was premature on the merge
content.html: sorry I was premature on the merge

content.raw: It might be better to use the appropriate vector based on `HeightmapShape::HeightType`.
content.html: It might be better to use the appropriate vector based on HeightmapShape::HeightType.

update.description:
Dartsim 6.9.0 was recently released and merged into homebrew-core, which broke our bottles for gazebo9 and gazebo10.

* [![Build Status](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=gazebo-install-one_liner-homebrew-amd64&build=1311)](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-install-one_liner-homebrew-amd64/1311/) https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-install-one_liner-homebrew-amd64/1311/

While rebuilding the bottles, I noticed a build failure for gazebo10:

* [![Build Status](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=generic-release-homebrew_bottle_builder/label=osx_highsierra&build=369)](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/generic-release-homebrew_bottle_builder/label=osx_highsierra/369/) https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/generic-release-homebrew_bottle_builder/label=osx_highsierra/369/

~~~
In file included from /tmp/gazebo10-20190528-97377-khdxwp/gazebo-10.1.0/gazebo/physics/dart/DARTHeightmapShape.cc:20:
In file included from /tmp/gazebo10-20190528-97377-khdxwp/gazebo-10.1.0/gazebo/physics/dart/DARTCollision.hh:23:
In file included from /tmp/gazebo10-20190528-97377-khdxwp/gazebo-10.1.0/gazebo/physics/dart/dart_inc.h:24:
In file included from /usr/local/include/dart/dart.hpp:33:
In file included from /usr/local/include/dart/config.hpp:5:
In file included from /usr/local/include/eigen3/Eigen/Core:441:
/usr/local/include/eigen3/Eigen/src/Core/AssignEvaluator.h:834:3: error: static_assert failed due to requirement 'Eigen::internal::has_ReturnType<ScalarBinaryOpTraits<typename ActualDstTypeCleaned::Scalar, typename Matrix<double, 3, 1, 0, 3, 1>::Scalar, assign_op<float, double> > >::value' "YOU_MIXED_DIFFERENT_NUMERIC_TYPES__YOU_NEED_TO_USE_THE_CAST_METHOD_OF_MATRIXBASE_TO_CAST_NUMERIC_TYPES_EXPLICITLY"
  EIGEN_CHECK_BINARY_COMPATIBILIY(Func,typename ActualDstTypeCleaned::Scalar,typename Src::Scalar);
  ^~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
/usr/local/include/eigen3/Eigen/src/Core/util/XprHelper.h:816:3: note: expanded from macro 'EIGEN_CHECK_BINARY_COMPATIBILIY'
  EIGEN_STATIC_ASSERT((Eigen::internal::has_ReturnType<ScalarBinaryOpTraits<LHS, RHS,BINOP> >::value), \
  ^~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
/usr/local/include/eigen3/Eigen/src/Core/util/StaticAssert.h:33:40: note: expanded from macro 'EIGEN_STATIC_ASSERT'
    #define EIGEN_STATIC_ASSERT(X,MSG) static_assert(X,#MSG);
                                       ^             ~
/usr/local/include/eigen3/Eigen/src/Core/PlainObjectBase.h:732:17: note: in instantiation of function template specialization 'Eigen::internal::call_assignment_no_alias<Eigen::Matrix<float, 3, 1, 0, 3, 1>, Eigen::Matrix<double, 3, 1, 0, 3, 1>, Eigen::internal::assign_op<float, double> >' requested here
      internal::call_assignment_no_alias(this->derived(), other.derived(), internal::assign_op<Scalar,typename OtherDerived::Scalar>());
                ^
/usr/local/include/eigen3/Eigen/src/Core/PlainObjectBase.h:537:7: note: in instantiation of function template specialization 'Eigen::PlainObjectBase<Eigen::Matrix<float, 3, 1, 0, 3, 1> >::_set_noalias<Eigen::Matrix<double, 3, 1, 0, 3, 1> >' requested here
      _set_noalias(other);
      ^
/usr/local/include/eigen3/Eigen/src/Core/Matrix.h:377:9: note: in instantiation of function template specialization 'Eigen::PlainObjectBase<Eigen::Matrix<float, 3, 1, 0, 3, 1> >::PlainObjectBase<Eigen::Matrix<double, 3, 1, 0, 3, 1> >' requested here
      : Base(other.derived())
        ^
/tmp/gazebo10-20190528-97377-khdxwp/gazebo-10.1.0/gazebo/physics/dart/DARTHeightmapShape.cc:67:36: note: in instantiation of function template specialization 'Eigen::Matrix<float, 3, 1, 0, 3, 1>::Matrix<Eigen::Matrix<double, 3, 1, 0, 3, 1> >' requested here
  this->dataPtr->Shape()->setScale(Eigen::Vector3d(this->scale.X(),
                                   ^
1 error generated.
~~~

Something in dart 6.9 (the switch to c++14?) has triggered this Eigen compilation error, based on the use of 32-bit `float` as the type for Heightmap heights:

* #!/osrf/gazebo/src/7c2936c66a23e6c6707fe4c7790458e75824407e/gazebo/physics/HeightmapShape.hh#lines-48

This should be enough to fix it.
update.title: Fix gazebo10 build with dart 6.9

content.raw: CI jobs are unstable, no surprising test failures
content.html: CI jobs are unstable, no surprising test failures
